basic_info.name: MJR College of Engineering and Technology Facilities

Section.name: About MJRCET
Section.description:
MJR College of Engineering and Technology was established in 2009 by MJR Educational Society to promote quality technical and management educational courses. The campus is located in a 15 acres peaceful and pollution free environment. The vision of the college is to emerge as one of the most preferred and respected educational institution, offering Engineering and Business Management courses. It is situated Chitoor, Andhra Pradesh. It offers under graduate and post graduate engineering. It also offers management courses.
MJR College of Engineering and Technology AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
